main event: On November 23, 1954, observers reported seeing four loosely spaced lights blinking on and off at Edwards AFB, California.
interesting points: The lights were brighter than stars and were observed for four minutes., The investigation revealed the objects to be unidentified., Initial assumptions included balloons, aircraft, and astronomical phenomena., No known aircraft or guided missiles were in the area at the time of the sighting., Further information regarding the nature of the objects was deemed desirable.
sighted object: four loosely spaced lights in the sky
witness description: Only one civilian employee of the Air Force observed the incident.
